Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the principal was arrested for defecating on his desk during the Pledge of Allegiance. The claim is false.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by stating that the principal defecated on his desk in front of hundreds of students during the Pledge of Allegiance.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake news article from a disreputable website.
